name: Phoenix Dynasty 2 - Eternal Hellfire Package
detailed_description:
You can have a piece of Darkazure’s power with this wing which was made of the matter that was formed when Darkazure was born. This is an unmissable opportunity for those who want to get the Demonic Bone Wings that dazzle with their unrivaled look and the Legionnaire title!

The package will be transferred to your account after your purchase. To acquire a present, you should click the “Gift” button to the upper left on the screen.

Remember! You can buy this package only once per account and use on one character!



Demonic Bone Wings
  • Suitable for all classes and can be used after Level 30.
  • Increases your Physique and Agility by 300, all your Element Damages by %5.
  • Bounded, which means it is untradeable.

Legionnaire Title
  • Suitable for all classes and can be used at every level.
  • This is a cosmetic title.
  • Bounded, which means it is untradeable.

short_description: This package has been prepared for Azurians who want to gain more power through their new look containing exclusive wings and the Legionnaire title.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium (R) D 3.0Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 5200 128M GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 32/64 bit Versions of Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10
  • Processor: Core (TM) 2 Quad Q6700 2.66G (2 CPU) and over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GT 512M GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible soundcard
